Ami ki vabe asha korbo, ami ki vabe ei jibonke theke nebo, ei obosthay ki kore tumi amay abar theke anonde anbe, amar jibonke kivabe theke nebe, eto shonge eto vabte paro, ami bujhte parchi na.

Tui kichu nei, tui kono moolyo nei. Kintu tui eki vabe mone korchis?

Mone hoy ekadhik karon. Ami janina, amra ekhon ek shathe kaj korechi, ami chao tomake mone hoi amar bepar hoye geche na. Theek aachhe, ami sob kichhu korte chesta korbo tai. Mone hoy, jokhon tomar mone abhimaner bhabe bhabe gondho hoi, tokhon dekha khub kothin. Stress dekha o khub kothin.
